mapper.insert: insert into weibo_tweet (id, `time`, source, `like`, transfer, comment, content, source_tid, flag, uid) VALUES (#{id}, #{time}, #{source}, #{like}, #{transfer}, #{comment},#{content}, #{sourceTid}, #{flag}, #{uid})
mapper.select: select ifnull(exists(select 1 from weibo_tweet where id = #{id}), 0);
select * from weibo_tweet where uid = #{uid} limit 10
select count(*) from weibo_tweet where uid = #{uid}
select * from weibo_tweet where uid = #{uid} limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
select count(*) as `count`, substr(`time`, 6, 8) as t from weibo_tweet where source_tid = #{tweetId} group by t

select fromTid, `from`, `to`, toTid, weight from(select weibo_tweet.id as fromTid, uid, nickname as `from` from weibo_tweet left join weibo_user on weibo_tweet.uid = weibo_user.id where weibo_tweet.id = #{tid}) tmp2 LEFT JOIN (select wt.source_tid as stid, wt.id as toTid, (wt.transfer + wt.comment + wt.like) as weight, wu.nickname as `to` from weibo_tweet wt left join weibo_user wu on wt.uid = wu.id where wu.nickname NOTNULL )tmp1 on tmp1.stid = tmp2.fromTid ORDER BY tmp1.weight desc limit 10;
